jsx.ui.ctrl
Class Menu

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
          jsx.Source
              jsx.ui.Widget
                  jsx.ui.Control
                      jsx.ui.ctrl.Clickable
                          jsx.ui.ctrl.Menu
All Implemented Interfaces:
OnRender
public class Menu
extends Clickable

A base class for menu widgets.

A menu widget is basically a menu-item that has a menu-list that may hold other controls.

A menu widget is firstly a Clickable that listens to high level events.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Constructor Detail

Menu

public Menu(java.lang.String title)

Constructs a menu widget.

This constructor invokes the super constructor. It sets up the menu as just a menu-item by expanding the CSS sub selector "item" to the underlying component.

Parameters:
title - The title text for the menu.
Since:
1.0
Method Detail

add

public Menu add(Control c)

Appends a control to this menu.

This method makes the menu to have a menu-list by removing the CSS sub selector "item" from the underlying component.

Parameters:
c - A control widget to append.
Returns:
The menu widget itself.
Since:
1.0

init

protected void init()

Initializes the current widget for the newly rendered underlying HTML element.

This method firstly invokes the overridden method of super class for it to behave like a clickable widget. It then renders the menu-list if existed and sets up necessary Pseudo widgets for the menu behaviors.

Overrides:
init in class Clickable
Since:
1.0
